body.name: August Organic Tampons, Super Absorbency, BPA Free Long Applicators, Toxin Free, Fragrance Free, Hypoallergenic, 32 Count

features: 32 COUNT: Includes 32 super tampons (packaged as two boxes of 16).
ORGANIC COTTON AND BPA FREE PLASTIC: August tampons are made from 100% certified organic cotton sourced in Turkey, with BPA-free plastic applicators.

DESIGNED FOR COMFORT AND ABSORBENCY: Our tampons open axially, like a pair of angel wings, to best fit the true shape of your vagina for more comfort and absorbency. Long applicators with smooth tips make for easier insertion.
TOXIN FREE AND HYPOALLERGENIC: All of our products are toxin-free, harmful chemical-free, fragrance-free, and hypoallergenic!
NO UNNECESSARY INGREDIENTS: August tampons are Free of pesticides, herbicides, fragrances, rayon, deodorants, dioxins, and dyes.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: August Organic Day Pads August Organic Night Pads August Organic Light Absorbency Tampons August Organic Regular Absorbency Tampons August Organic Super Absorbency Tampons Absorbency 60 mL 80 mL Up to 6 mL 6-9 mL 9-12 mL 100% Organic Cotton ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Hypoallergenic ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Free of Toxins, Fragrances, and Harmful Chemicals ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple organic tampons!
reviews.reviewText: Great quality tampons sourced from Germany. BPA free plastic so nothing toxic going inside your body. Climate neutral certified, recycled net plastic (save the turtles) 1% for the planet! I love everything about this brand.Tampons were very absorbent I could go all night 8-12 hours and have no issues in the morning when I stood up and walked around for a bit. They did go in okay I did have to tug a little bit to get the applicator out but it didn’t pull it out like I felt it was, I couldn’t feel it and it wasn’t uncomfortable at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and absorbent
reviews.reviewText: I try to always opt for organic feminine products. Definitely important to use the best materials for such a delicate product. This was a new to me brand that I was excited to use because there aren’t too many organic feminine products out there. More and more companies are coming up on the scene, and I’m always willing to try up and coming brands.These come in two box set. Very convenient to keep one at work and one at home, so I am covered at all times. These were easy to use and comfortable. The applicator was smooth and has a grip to hold onto during insertion. The super strength version kept me going doing the heavy flow times.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Hard to use applicator makes these too frustrating
reviews.reviewText: The packaging on these are great, I like the different look they have. The tampon itself seems good, but I don’t have a lot of luck with the applicator on these. The plunger does not seem to easily push the tampon out and makes it difficult to insert. It’s too frustrating of a struggle for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These tampons are comfortable and absorb really well for heavy days. The plastic applicator is smooth and works well, but I did find it a bit longer than other applicators. The tampons themselves were very comfortable and didn't leak. I love that these are made with organic cotton, and that August is an inclusive company that donates period products to underserved communities.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For the first-timer!
reviews.reviewText: For the first-timers like me who have never really dared to wear a tampon, I tried.Definitely had my doubts, and was a bit hesitant, since there's always a first time. I amGlad i was able to use these organic tampons, which come with a BPA-free applicator for easy insertion. It worked like a charm.2 sets of tampon packs with 16 tampons each. Super absorbency as shown in the description. I don't recommend wearing them at night though.Although, the first time dealing with tampons, i have previously used day/night pads from this brand and liked them too. So I was sure this product was gonna be equally good.Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Hard to beat organic
reviews.reviewText: The wife says these organic tampons are easy to use and sufficiently absorbent to be useful in everyday situations. Not quite as good as her favorite brand, but still a solid choice. Owing to the organic and hypoallergenic nature of these tampons, they might be a good choice to stock for guests or simply to keep as a backup at work, in the car, or stashed in your outdoor/camping equipment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars organic, bpa free tampons
reviews.reviewText: These tampons work great. Applicator is smooth and the super absorbency is sufficient. I love that it is made of fragrance free organic material so there are no concerns of toxic chemicals, dyes, or pesticides. I do wish it came with a cardboard applicator variety, but bpa free plastic is certainly easier to use. No complaints as the product works great and the organic material offers peace of mind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Super large tampon
reviews.reviewText: These tampons are larger in size than other brand when comparing the same Super absorbency. The applicator is thick and lack a good area to grip, therefore making it difficult to use.
